mcpnp.upnp.failed.unavailable: UPnP is not available on your router! No ports were forwarded.
mcpnp.upnp.failed.mapped: The port was already in use! No ports were forwarded.
mcpnp.upnp.success:
Sucessfully forwarded port!
Keep in mind that you MUST properly exit the world when you're done for the port to be closed.
